description:
This course teaches you 6 simple NLP techniques to get motivated to do important things in your everyday life, which you were not able to do previously due to lack of motivation. These techniques are very simple and very easy to do and understand. Each technique takes 3-5 minutes each.

The techniques taught in the course are-

1) Recipe for your motivation

2) Swish Technique

3) Adding music to your goal

4) Motivation switch

5) Magic Iris pattern

6) New motivation behavior generator
title: Motivate Yourself Now Through 6 NLP Techniques
